creator: @next

content:
Hi Grzegorz,

This usually happens because Thunderbird (and Firefox for that matter) does not use the system trust store, and Kaspersky is resigning every request with its own certificate while putting its root certificate into the system trust store. You can either disable the email protection component of Kaspersky, or import its root certificate into Thunderbird. They have a support article for this: https://support.kaspersky.com/common/compatibility/14620#block2

Regards, Balázs
creator: meskobalazs

creator: marc.wansard

content: Et si tu vas sur le webmail de Skynet : est-ce que ce sous-dossier existe et peut-on voir les 15 messages ? Tu peux encore faire le manipe suivante : dans TB va à Aide > Informations de dépannage > Dossier de profil > Ouvrir le dossier.... puis quitter TB. Dans le dossier de profil va à ImapMail > imap.skynet.be > Messages supprimés.sbd > Mobile - Yoin.sbd et cherche les fichiers Docteur(s) et Docteur(s).msf. Supprime le fichier Docteur(s).msf et redémarre TB. Si les 15 messages manquent toujours retour dans le dossier de profil au même endroit : s'il existe un fichier Docteur(s) sans extension, copie-le, va dans Mail > Local Folders et dépose la copie dans Local Folders. Redémarre TB et dans le Dossier Locaux ouvre le dossier Docteur(s)

content:
Dmitriy said
I understand this, but here the question is rather not in a specific extension, but in the WebExtension API that the extensions use. And is there a way to grant these permissions to the extension in advance without asking the user for them?

I believe you can use group policies on Windows. But it is not something I am really au fait with. I would suggest your query might get more useful responses in the enterprise mailing list. in particular you might want to look to this thread. https://thunderbird.topicbox.com/groups/enterprise/Tca612a40e26047fa/give-permissions-to-extensions-installed-using-policies-json-enterprise-policy

content:
Se non spieghi esattamente quali problemi incontri, non saprei che dirti... Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: Google stores an app password in your email client, not your actual password. When you change your password, Thunderbird needs to receive the updated password. I suggest clicking to settings>privacy&security to delete the current password and then pursue getting the new one. After you respond to the Google prompt, Google will store a new app password in thunderbird.
creator: davidsk

content:
Google is asking for 2-step verification but is not allowing me to use the simplest of verification - a text message. That option is grayed out.

Google are offering multiple ways to sign in. Go to your Google account and select Security - How you sign in to Google. https://myaccount.google.com/

Pick the method which fits best for you.

Can I make changes directly in Thunderbird and this imap and avoid this Google nonsense?

No, you can't. And it isn't nonsense, it's in you best interest.

content:
Hello there


Thunderbird is freezing in this case hanging. You can try to start up in safe modus if the program is working then there might be a theme or add on that is not working. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

If problems are more likely that other steps are needed try to use this subject : Rebuild the global database , go to the profile folder and delete the global~messages~db.sqlite.file and restart Thunderbird. That rebuilds that database.

Reinstalling Thunderbird can work there too. Backup Thunderbird s profile folder reinstall the program. Download that latest version of Thunderbird. Restore that profile and or setup that recent account at Thunderbird again.

Use the latest version of Thunderbird and try to download from trusted download points. https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/desktop/



Questions are open.

Greetings googlethunderbird.

content:
Hello there

By adjusting the view settings. Or use the option : repair folder / deleting msf.files/repair the global database/to solve that issue.If that ain’t the solution there are more options to get that issue solved : Like disabling the anti virus software if you think that is really blocking the program. Or start up in safe modus.

Repair folder 1.Click on the defect folder ,properties>repair folder>then click repair folder. Delete inbox.msf files. 2.profilefolder>delete inbox.msf files>restart thunderbird. Select other view. 3. use the configuration for the message pane visible : view>layout>message pane. Safe modus. 4.start up in safe modus that disables the add ons that are been used in your program. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Questions are open. Greetings google thunderbird
creator: Googlethunderbird.

content:
こんにちは

ビュー設定を調整します。または、オプション:フォルダの修復/msf.filesの削除/グローバルデータベースの修復/を使用して、その問題を解決します。それが解決策でない場合は、その問題を解決するためのより多くのオプションがあります:それが本当にプログラムをブロックしていると思われる場合は、ウイルス対策ソフトウェアを無効にするなど。または、安全な方法で起動します。

修復フォルダ 1.欠陥フォルダ、properties>repairフォルダをクリックし>次に修復フォルダをクリックします。inbox.msf ファイルを削除します。2.ProfileFolder>Inbox.msfファイルを削除>Thunderbirdを再起動します。他のビューを選択します。3. 表示されるメッセージ ペイン (View>Layout>Message ペイン) の設定を使用します。安全な手口。4.プログラムで使用されているアドオンを無効にする安全なモードで起動します。https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird
creator: Googlethunderbird.
